name: Senseless Things
description: '''Senseless Things''' were an [[England|English]] [[pop punk]] band, formed in 1986 in London. The band released four studio albums and achieved two [[UK Singles Chart|UK Top 20]] hit singles before splitting up in 1995. Senseless Things reformed in 2017 to play several gigs including [[Shepherd's Bush Empire]], as well as to record and release new material. Vocalist [[Mark Keds]] died in early 2021.
